LanguageData.OMC_Trophy_Chainsword.label: Empress's Blessing
LanguageData.OMC_Trophy_Chainsword.description:
The good old chainsword is designed to destroy the enemies of Obsidia Empire.

This is a rare trophy weapon.

Feature: a built-in module that improves combat performance.

LanguageData.ODC_Trophy_Sickle_A.description:

LanguageData.ODC_Trophy_BladeLauncher_A.label: Harvest
LanguageData.ODC_Trophy_BladeLauncher_A.description:
Rare heavy blade launcher weapon used by Obsidia Drifters. This weapon was a working tool, but upgraded for ranged combat.

This is a rare trophy weapon.

Feature: a built-in module that improves work skills.

LanguageData.ODC_Trophy_BladeLauncher_A_P.description:

This is a rare trophy weapon.

Feature: a built-in module that improves work skills.

LanguageData.OE_Trophy_Shovel.label: Lloyd's Shovel
LanguageData.OE_Trophy_Shovel.description:
The favorite shovel used by the greatest Lloyd Frontera, who received his title of The Greatest Estate Developer known throughout the Obsidia Empire.

This is a rare trophy weapon.

Feature: a built-in module that improves mining skills.
LanguageData.OE_Trophy_Shovel.tools.shovel.label: shovel
LanguageData.OE_Trophy_Shovel_P.label: Persona Lloyd's Shovel
LanguageData.OE_Trophy_Shovel_P.description:
The favorite persona shovel used by the greatest Lloyd Frontera, who received his title of The Greatest Estate Developer known throughout the Obsidia Empire.

This is a rare trophy weapon.

Feature: a built-in module that improves mining skills.
LanguageData.OE_Trophy_Shovel_P.tools.shovel.label: shovel
LanguageData.OE_Trophy_BrokenSword.label: Black Prince Sword
LanguageData.OE_Trophy_BrokenSword.description:
According to legend, an unknown sword fell from the skies and its first owner became Black Prince Lelouch, who started Obsidia's Last War. But before the end of this war, the sword broke at the time of Lelouch’s death, and to this day only a fragment of the sword remains.

This is a rare trophy weapon.

Feature: improves social impact and able to deal a random additional type of damage.
LanguageData.OE_Trophy_BrokenSword.tools.handle.label: handle
LanguageData.OE_Trophy_BrokenSword.tools.point.label: point
LanguageData.OE_Trophy_BrokenSword.tools.edge.label: edge
LanguageData.OE_Trophy_BrokenSword_P.label: Persona Black Prince Sword
LanguageData.OE_Trophy_BrokenSword_P.description:
According to legend, an unknown persona sword fell from the skies and its first owner became Black Prince Lelouch, who started Obsidia's Last War. But before the end of this war, the sword broke at the time of Lelouch’s death, and to this day only a fragment of the sword remains.

This is a rare trophy weapon.

Feature: improves social impact and able to deal a random additional type of damage.
LanguageData.OE_Trophy_BrokenSword_P.tools.edge.label: edge
LanguageData.OE_Trophy_MechHammer.label: Forgestorm
LanguageData.OE_Trophy_MechHammer.description:
The hammer of the famous ancient blacksmith Luke Ainsworth, which was passed on and improved from generation to generation.

This is a rare trophy weapon.

Feature: a built-in module that improves mechanitor skills.
LanguageData.OE_Trophy_MechHammer.tools.handle.label: handle
LanguageData.OE_Trophy_MechHammer.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.OE_Trophy_MechHammer_P.label: Persona Forgestorm
LanguageData.OE_Trophy_MechHammer_P.description:

This is a rare trophy weapon.

Feature: a built-in module that improves mechanitor skills.
LanguageData.OE_Trophy_MechHammer_P.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.Bullet_OE_Trophy_RP.label: Prototype sX-02a energy bullet
LanguageData.OE_Trophy_RepairPistol.label: Prototype sX-02a
LanguageData.OE_Trophy_RepairPistol.description:
Prototype of a new repair pistol that equipped with a tools synthesizator which make most construction jobs easier.

This is a rare trophy weapon.

Feature: a built-in module that improves construction skills.
LanguageData.OE_Trophy_RepairPistol.tools.grip.label: grip
LanguageData.OE_Trophy_RepairPistol_P.label: Paragon Prototype sX-02a
LanguageData.OE_Trophy_RepairPistol_P.description:
Prototype of a new paragon repair pistol that equipped with a tools synthesizator which make most construction jobs easier.

This is a rare trophy weapon.

Feature: a built-in module that improves construction skills.
LanguageData.Bullet_OE_Trophy_UG.label: Titanstrike energy ball
LanguageData.OE_Trophy_UnstableGun.label: Titanstrike
LanguageData.OE_Trophy_UnstableGun.description:
This is a prohibited weapon in Obsidia Empire and can only be obtained illegally. Due to a poorly designed energy delivery system, the weapon is quite weak, but there is a 5% chance that the weapon can release a huge amount of energy at once, causing incredible damage.

This is a rare trophy weapon.

Feature: has a 5% chance of dealing incredible damage.
LanguageData.OE_Trophy_UnstableGun.tools.grip.label: grip
LanguageData.OE_Trophy_UnstableGun.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.OE_Trophy_UnstableGun_P.label: Paragon Titanstrike
LanguageData.OE_Trophy_UnstableGun_P.description:
This is a prohibited paragon weapon in Obsidia Empire and can only be obtained illegally. Due to a poorly designed energy delivery system, the weapon is quite weak, but there is a 5% chance that the weapon can release a huge amount of energy at once, causing incredible damage.

This is a rare trophy weapon.

Feature: has a 5% chance of dealing incredible damage.
LanguageData.OE_Trophy_UnstableGun_P.tools.grip.label: grip
LanguageData.Bullet_OE_Trophy_SC.label: Ashisogi Jizō sting
LanguageData.OE_Trophy_SampleCollector.label: Ashisogi Jizō
LanguageData.OE_Trophy_SampleCollector.description:
One of the forgotten research objects of Mayuri Kurotsuchi. The darts of this weapon contain an unstable toxin that randomly affects the target. It is not recommended to use in combat, since the effects can randomly debuff or buff the target.

This is a rare trophy weapon.

Feature: deals unstable toxin damage that applies various random effects.
LanguageData.OE_Trophy_SampleCollector_P.label: Paragon Ashisogi Jizō
LanguageData.OE_Trophy_SampleCollector_P.description:
One of the forgotten research objects of Mayuri Kurotsuchi. The darts of this paragon weapon contain an unstable toxin that randomly affects the target. It is not recommended to use in combat, since the effects can randomly debuff or buff the target.

This is a rare trophy weapon.

Feature: deals unstable toxin damage that applies various random effects.
LanguageData.Bullet_OES_LS_A.label: Legion Spear energy bullet
LanguageData.OES_LegionSpear_A.label: Legion Spear
LanguageData.OES_LegionSpear_A.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Legion Spear
LanguageData.OES_LegionSpear_A.description:
A gun-spear is a replica of the main weapon designed for the Fallen Legion. Specially modified weapon charged with Fire and EMP damages.

This modification deprives item's quality levels.

Weapons can be upgraded up to 5 times.
LanguageData.OES_LegionSpear_A.tools.point.label: point
LanguageData.Bullet_OES_LS_B.label: Legion Spear Mk.I energy bullet
LanguageData.OES_LegionSpear_B.label: Legion Spear Mk.I
LanguageData.OES_LegionSpear_B.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Legion Spear Mk.I
LanguageData.OES_LegionSpear_B.description:
A gun-spear is a replica of the main weapon designed for the Fallen Legion. Specially modified weapon charged with Fire and EMP damages.

This modification deprives item's quality levels.

Weapons can be upgraded up to 5 times.

Mk.I - weapon damage increased.
LanguageData.OES_LegionSpear_B.tools.point.label: point
LanguageData.Bullet_OES_LS_C.label: Legion Spear Mk.II energy bullet
LanguageData.OES_LegionSpear_C.label: Legion Spear Mk.II
LanguageData.OES_LegionSpear_C.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Legion Spear Mk.II
LanguageData.OES_LegionSpear_C.description:
A gun-spear is a replica of the main weapon designed for the Fallen Legion. Specially modified weapon charged with Fire and EMP damages.

This modification deprives item's quality levels.

Weapons can be upgraded up to 5 times.

Mk.I - weapon damage increased.

Mk.II - increased firing range.
LanguageData.OES_LegionSpear_C.tools.point.label: point
LanguageData.Bullet_OES_LS_D.label: Legion Spear Mk.III energy bullet
LanguageData.OES_LegionSpear_D.label: Legion Spear Mk.III
LanguageData.OES_LegionSpear_D.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Legion Spear Mk.III
LanguageData.OES_LegionSpear_D.description:
A gun-spear is a replica of the main weapon designed for the Fallen Legion. Specially modified weapon charged with Fire and EMP damages.

This modification deprives item's quality levels.

Weapons can be upgraded up to 5 times.

Mk.I - weapon damage increased.

Mk.II - increased firing range.

Mk.III - weapon accuracy increased.
LanguageData.OES_LegionSpear_D.tools.point.label: point
LanguageData.Bullet_OES_LS_E.label: Legion Spear Mk.IV energy bullet
LanguageData.OES_LegionSpear_E.label: Legion Spear Mk.IV
LanguageData.OES_LegionSpear_E.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Legion Spear Mk.IV
LanguageData.OES_LegionSpear_E.description:
A gun-spear is a replica of the main weapon designed for the Fallen Legion. Specially modified weapon charged with Fire and EMP damages.

This modification deprives item's quality levels.

Weapons can be upgraded up to 5 times.

Mk.I - weapon damage increased.

Mk.II - increased firing range.

Mk.III - weapon accuracy increased.

Mk.IV - armor penetration increased.
LanguageData.OES_LegionSpear_E.tools.point.label: point
LanguageData.Bullet_OES_LS_F.label: Legion Spear Mk.V energy bullet
LanguageData.OES_LegionSpear_F.label: Legion Spear Mk.V
LanguageData.OES_LegionSpear_F.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Legion Spear Mk.V
LanguageData.OES_LegionSpear_F.description:
A gun-spear is a replica of the main weapon designed for the Fallen Legion. Specially modified weapon charged with Fire and EMP damages.

This modification deprives item's quality levels.

Weapons can be upgraded up to 5 times.

Mk.I - weapon damage increased.

Mk.II - increased firing range.

Mk.III - weapon accuracy increased.

Mk.IV - armor penetration increased.

Mk.V - all stats significantly increased.
LanguageData.OES_LegionSpear_F.tools.point.label: point
LanguageData.Wave_CAC_Trophy_W.label: First Arachna's Sin - Lust wave
LanguageData.CAC_Trophy_Whip.label: First Arachna's Sin - Lust
LanguageData.CAC_Trophy_Whip.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: First Arachna's Sin - Lust
LanguageData.CAC_Trophy_Whip.description: Amalgam weapon created on the basis of EGO technology. Whip used by CAC Priest. Specially modified weapon with increased power and charged with Acid and Fire damages.\n\nThis weapon represents First Arachna's Sin - Lust. Increases the owner's social and animal training stats at the expense of increased joy reduction.
LanguageData.CAC_Trophy_Whip.tools.handle.label: handle
LanguageData.Bullet_CAC_Trophy_MG.label: Second Arachna's Sin - Gluttony bullet
LanguageData.CAC_Trophy_Minigun.label: Second Arachna's Sin - Gluttony
LanguageData.CAC_Trophy_Minigun.description: Amalgam weapon created on the basis of EGO technology. Minigun used by CAC Priest. Specially modified weapon with increased power and charged with Acid and Fire damages.\n\nThis weapon represents Second Arachna's Sin - Gluttony. Increases the owner's healing stats at the expense of increased nutrition reduction.
LanguageData.CAC_Trophy_Minigun.tools.fang.label: fang
LanguageData.CAC_Trophy_BigScythe.label: Third Arachna's Sin - Greed
LanguageData.CAC_Trophy_BigScythe.description: Amalgam weapon created on the basis of EGO technology. Big Scythe used by CAC Priest. Specially modified weapon with increased power and charged with Acid and Fire damages.\n\nThis weapon represents Third Arachna's Sin - Greed. Increases the owner's gathering stats at the expense of working stats.
LanguageData.CAC_Trophy_BigScythe.tools.handle.label: handle
LanguageData.CAC_Trophy_BigScythe.tools.edge.label: edge
LanguageData.Bullet_CAC_Trophy_P.label: Fourth Arachna's Sin - Sloth bullet
LanguageData.CAC_Trophy_Pistol.label: Fourth Arachna's Sin - Sloth
LanguageData.CAC_Trophy_Pistol.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Fourth Arachna's Sin - Sloth
LanguageData.CAC_Trophy_Pistol.description: Amalgam weapon created on the basis of EGO technology. Pistol used by CAC Priest. Specially modified weapon with increased power and charged with Acid and Fire damages.\n\nThis weapon represents Fourth Arachna's Sin - Sloth. Increases the owner's mechanitor stats at the expense of move speed stat and increased rest reduction.
LanguageData.CAC_Trophy_Pistol.tools.fang.label: fang
LanguageData.Bullet_CAC_Trophy_S.label: Fifth Arachna's Sin - Wrath blast
LanguageData.CAC_Trophy_Shotgun.label: Fifth Arachna's Sin - Wrath
LanguageData.CAC_Trophy_Shotgun.description: Amalgam weapon created on the basis of EGO technology. Shotgun used by CAC Priest. Specially modified weapon with increased power and charged with Acid and Fire damages.\n\nThis weapon represents Fifth Arachna's Sin - Wrath. Increases the owner's chance to deal x2 or x3 damage with a weapon at the expense of mental stability.
LanguageData.CAC_Trophy_Shotgun.tools.fang.label: fang
LanguageData.CAC_Trophy_Knife.label: Sixth Arachna's Sin - Envy
LanguageData.CAC_Trophy_Knife.description: Amalgam weapon created on the basis of EGO technology. Knife used by CAC Priest. Specially modified weapon with increased power and charged with Acid and Fire damages.\n\nThis weapon represents Sixth Arachna's Sin - Envy. Increases the owner's working and learning stats at the expense of social stats.
LanguageData.CAC_Trophy_Knife.tools.handle.label: handle
LanguageData.CAC_Trophy_Knife.tools.blade.label: blade
LanguageData.CAC_Trophy_Knife.tools.point.label: point
LanguageData.Bullet_CAC_Trophy_SR.label: Seventh Arachna's Sin - Pride bullet
LanguageData.CAC_Trophy_SniperRifle.label: Seventh Arachna's Sin - Pride
LanguageData.CAC_Trophy_SniperRifle.description: Amalgam weapon created on the basis of EGO technology. Sniper Rifle used by CAC Priest. Specially modified weapon with increased power and charged with Acid and Fire damages.\n\nThis weapon represents Seventh Arachna's Sin - Pride. Increases the owner's psy stats at the expense of increased pain sensitivity.
LanguageData.CAC_Trophy_SniperRifle.tools.fang.label: fang
LanguageData.ODC_Trophy_PowerFist_A.label: Proto Gauntlet
LanguageData.ODC_Trophy_PowerFist_A.description: A strange power gauntlet of unknown origin and creator. Marked by Obsidia Drifters. Looks like it could be easily upgraded.
LanguageData.ODC_Trophy_PowerFist_B.label: Eternal Gauntlet
LanguageData.ODC_Trophy_PowerFist_B.description: Modified strange power gauntlet was designed by unknown creator from Obsidia Drifters to channel the power of Power Stones.\n\nThis modification deprives item's quality levels.
LanguageData.ODC_Trophy_PowerFist_C.label: Eternal Gauntlet Mk.I
LanguageData.ODC_Trophy_PowerFist_C.description:
Modified strange power gauntlet was designed by unknown creator from Obsidia Drifters to channel the power of Power Stones.

This modification deprives item's quality levels.

Mk.I - Renegade Power Stone. Global work speed increased.
LanguageData.ODC_Trophy_PowerFist_D.label: Eternal Gauntlet Mk.II
LanguageData.ODC_Trophy_PowerFist_D.description:
Modified strange power gauntlet was designed by unknown creator from Obsidia Drifters to channel the power of Power Stones.

This modification deprives item's quality levels.

Mk.I - Renegade Power Stone. Global work speed increased.

Mk.II - Pilgrim Power Stone. Social and Negotiation abilities increased.
LanguageData.ODC_Trophy_PowerFist_E.label: Eternal Gauntlet Mk.III
LanguageData.ODC_Trophy_PowerFist_E.description:
Modified strange power gauntlet was designed by unknown creator from Obsidia Drifters to channel the power of Power Stones.

This modification deprives item's quality levels.

Mk.I - Renegade Power Stone. Global work speed increased.

Mk.II - Pilgrim Power Stone. Social and Negotiation abilities increased.

Mk.III - Syndicate Power Stone. Joy fall rate reduced.
LanguageData.ODC_Trophy_PowerFist_F.label: Eternal Gauntlet Mk.IV
LanguageData.ODC_Trophy_PowerFist_F.description:
Modified strange power gauntlet was designed by unknown creator from Obsidia Drifters to channel the power of Power Stones.

This modification deprives item's quality levels.

Mk.I - Renegade Power Stone. Global work speed increased.

Mk.II - Pilgrim Power Stone. Social and Negotiation abilities increased.

Mk.III - Syndicate Power Stone. Joy fall rate reduced.

Mk.IV - Might Power Stone. Weapon damage increased. Able to deal additional Fire damage.
LanguageData.ODC_Trophy_PowerFist_G.label: Eternal Gauntlet Mk.V
LanguageData.ODC_Trophy_PowerFist_G.description:
Modified strange power gauntlet was designed by unknown creator from Obsidia Drifters to channel the power of Power Stones.

This modification deprives item's quality levels.

Mk.I - Renegade Power Stone. Global work speed increased.

Mk.II - Pilgrim Power Stone. Social and Negotiation abilities increased.

Mk.III - Syndicate Power Stone. Joy fall rate reduced.

Mk.IV - Might Power Stone. Weapon damage increased. Able to deal additional Fire damage.

Mk.V - Dexterity Power Stone. Melee dodge and hit chances increased. Able to deal additional EMP damage.
LanguageData.ODC_Trophy_PowerFist_H.label: Eternal Gauntlet Mk.VI
LanguageData.ODC_Trophy_PowerFist_H.description:
Modified strange power gauntlet was designed by unknown creator from Obsidia Drifters to channel the power of Power Stones.

This modification deprives item's quality levels.

Mk.I - Renegade Power Stone. Global work speed increased.

Mk.II - Pilgrim Power Stone. Social and Negotiation abilities increased.

Mk.III - Syndicate Power Stone. Joy fall rate reduced.

Mk.IV - Might Power Stone. Weapon damage increased. Able to deal additional Fire damage.

Mk.V - Dexterity Power Stone. Melee dodge and hit chances increased. Able to deal additional EMP damage.

Mk.VI - Vitality Power Stone. Healing factor increased. Able to deal additional Acid damage.
LanguageData.ODC_Trophy_PowerFist_I.label: Eternal Gauntlet Mk.VII
LanguageData.ODC_Trophy_PowerFist_I.description:
Modified strange power gauntlet was designed by unknown creator from Obsidia Drifters to channel the power of Power Stones.

This modification deprives item's quality levels.

Mk.I - Renegade Power Stone. Global work speed increased.

Mk.II - Pilgrim Power Stone. Social and Negotiation abilities increased.

Mk.III - Syndicate Power Stone. Joy fall rate reduced.

Mk.IV - Might Power Stone. Weapon damage increased. Able to deal additional Fire damage.

Mk.V - Dexterity Power Stone. Melee dodge and hit chances increased. Able to deal additional EMP damage.

Mk.VI - Vitality Power Stone. Healing factor increased. Able to deal additional Acid damage.

Mk.VII - Wisdom Power Stone. Global learning factor increased. Able to deal additional Cryo damage.
LanguageData.ODC_Trophy_PowerFist_J.label: Eternal Gauntlet Mk.VIII
LanguageData.ODC_Trophy_PowerFist_J.description:
Modified strange power gauntlet was designed by unknown creator from Obsidia Drifters to channel the power of Power Stones.

This modification deprives item's quality levels.

Mk.I - Renegade Power Stone. Global work speed increased.

Mk.II - Pilgrim Power Stone. Social and Negotiation abilities increased.

Mk.III - Syndicate Power Stone. Joy fall rate reduced.

Mk.IV - Might Power Stone. Weapon damage increased. Able to deal additional Fire damage.

Mk.V - Dexterity Power Stone. Melee dodge and hit chances increased. Able to deal additional EMP damage.

Mk.VI - Vitality Power Stone. Healing factor increased. Able to deal additional Acid damage.

Mk.VII - Wisdom Power Stone. Global learning factor increased. Able to deal additional Cryo damage.

Mk.VIII - Universe Power Stone. Unleashed hidden power. Depends on the available forces in the universe.
LanguageData.OMC_Trophy_Chainsword_I.label: Inlaid Empress's Blessing
LanguageData.OMC_Trophy_Chainsword_I.description:
The good old chainsword is designed to destroy the enemies of Obsidia Empire.

This is a rare trophy weapon.

Feature: a built-in module that improves combat performance.

Inlaid with Insight Power Stone: Weapon bonus stats increased.
LanguageData.Bullet_OMC_Trophy_P_I.label: Inlaid Prototype sX-01a bullet
LanguageData.OMC_Trophy_Pistol_I.label: Inlaid Prototype sX-01a
LanguageData.OMC_Trophy_Pistol_I.description:
Prototype of a new pistol that uses an AI module to improve accuracy.

This is a rare trophy weapon.

Feature: built-in accuracy stabilization module.

Inlaid with Vitality Power Stone: Weapon operational stats increased.
LanguageData.OMC_Trophy_Pistol_I.tools.grip.label: grip
LanguageData.OMC_Trophy_Pistol_I.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.OTC_Trophy_Sword_I_Acid.label: Inlaid Acid Rift
LanguageData.OTC_Trophy_Sword_I_Acid.description:
Limited edition unique elemental sword.

This is a rare trophy weapon with Acid charges.

Feature: a built-in module that improves combat performance.

Inlaid with Vitality Power Stone: Weapon operational stats increased.

Feature: a built-in module that improves combat performance.

LanguageData.OTC_Trophy_Sword_I_EMP.label: Inlaid EMP Rift
LanguageData.OTC_Trophy_Sword_I_EMP.description:
Limited edition unique elemental sword.

This is a rare trophy weapon with EMP charges.

Feature: a built-in module that improves combat performance.

Warning! EMP damage isn't intended to destroy meatbags.

Inlaid with Vitality Power Stone: Weapon operational stats increased.

LanguageData.Bullet_OTC_Trophy_C_I.label: Inlaid Randy's card
LanguageData.OTC_Trophy_Cards_I.label: Inlaid Randy's Deck
LanguageData.OTC_Trophy_Cards_I.description:
Deck of combat throwing cards designed by a certain engineer, Randy.

This is a rare trophy weapon.

Feature: able to deal a random additional type of damage.

Inlaid with Might Power Stone: Weapon combat stats increased.
LanguageData.OTC_Trophy_Cards_I.tools.pouch.label: pouch
LanguageData.OTC_Trophy_Cards_I.tools.card.label: card
LanguageData.OCC_Trophy_Drillspear_I.label: Inlaid Balor
LanguageData.OCC_Trophy_Drillspear_I.description:
Spear-drill, a replica of the personal weapon of the great siegemaster Balor.

This is a rare trophy weapon.

Feature: designed to destroy structures.

Inlaid with Might Power Stone: Weapon combat stats increased.
LanguageData.Bullet_OCC_Trophy_RG_I.label: Inlaid Cronus charge
LanguageData.OCC_Trophy_Railgun_I.label: Inlaid Cronus
LanguageData.OCC_Trophy_Railgun_I.description:
Sample weapon of new experimental railgun.

This is a rare trophy weapon.

Feature: ultra-fast explosive projectiles.

Inlaid with Dexterity Power Stone: Weapon performance stats increased.
LanguageData.OCC_Trophy_Railgun_I.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.OCC_Trophy_Railgun_I.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.OEC_Trophy_Scepter_I.label: Inlaid Ancient Scepter
LanguageData.OEC_Trophy_Scepter_I.description:
An ancient scepter based on an alien artifact.

This is a rare trophy weapon.

Feature: enhance the wielder's psychic powers.

Inlaid with Insight Power Stone: Weapon bonus stats increased.
LanguageData.Bullet_OEC_Trophy_P_I.label: Inlaid Divinity bullet
LanguageData.OEC_Trophy_Pistol_I.label: Inlaid Divinity
LanguageData.OEC_Trophy_Pistol_I.description:
This antique pistol has served Obsidia Empire for centuries.

This is a rare trophy weapon.

Feature: a built-in module that improves combat performance and psychic powers.

Inlaid with Dexterity Power Stone: Weapon performance stats increased.
LanguageData.OEC_Trophy_Pistol_I.tools.blade.label: blade
LanguageData.ODC_Trophy_Sickle_C_I.label: Inlaid Temptation - Apex
LanguageData.ODC_Trophy_Sickle_C_I.description:
An archaic sickle crafted by the best crafters on special orders from the elite Obsidia Drifters.

This is a rare trophy weapon.

Feature: a built-in module that improves combat performance.

Inlaid with Might Power Stone: Weapon combat stats increased.
LanguageData.ODC_Trophy_Sickle_C_I.tools.handle.label: handle
LanguageData.ODC_Trophy_Sickle_C_I.tools.blade.label: blade
LanguageData.Bullet_ODC_Trophy_BL_C_I.label: Inlaid Harvest saw
LanguageData.ODC_Trophy_BladeLauncher_C_I.label: Inlaid Harvest - Apex
LanguageData.ODC_Trophy_BladeLauncher_C_I.description:
Rare heavy blade launcher weapon used by Obsidia Drifters. This weapon was a working tool, but upgraded for ranged combat.

This is a rare trophy weapon.

Feature: a built-in module that improves work skills.

Inlaid with Insight Power Stone: Weapon bonus stats increased.
LanguageData.OES_Trophy_BigHammer.label: Betrayer's Weight
LanguageData.OES_Trophy_BigHammer.description:
Beneath the ruins of what was once revered, Volskygge’s hands shaped the hammer under a darkened sky. The crystal that crowns the weapon is no mere ornament—it is the shard of his broken allegiance. As one of the forsaken, a former hero of the Empire, Volskygge forged this weapon for a new purpose. The hammer's weight mirrors the crushing burden of betrayal, its blows resonating with the sorrow of a forgotten warrior. Each strike is a reminder of his fall from grace, and the new path he walks, shrouded in shadow.

Specially modified weapon charged with Stun, Fire and EMP damages.

This modification deprives item's quality levels.
LanguageData.OES_Trophy_BigHammer.tools.handle.label: handle
LanguageData.OES_Trophy_BigHammer.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.OMG_Trophy_Knife.label: Platebreaker
LanguageData.OMG_Trophy_Knife.description:
Forged with the sole purpose of piercing through armor, Platebreaker is a weapon of war, able to exploit the weakest points in any protection. The dagger’s precision and strength make it lethal in the hands of a skilled warrior.

Specially modified weapon charged with Necrobane, Stun and EMP damages.

This modification deprives item's quality levels.
LanguageData.OMG_Trophy_Knife.tools.handle.label: handle
LanguageData.OMG_Trophy_Knife.tools.blade.label: blade
LanguageData.OMG_Trophy_Knife.tools.point.label: point
LanguageData.Bullet_OMG_Trophy_PG.label: Neon Echo notes
LanguageData.OMG_Trophy_PowerGuitar.label: Neon Echo
LanguageData.OMG_Trophy_PowerGuitar.description:
This cyber-guitar of unknown origin is surrounded by rumors, passed from one owner to the next. According to legends, it once had a life of its own and now carries a strange, haunting resonance.

Specially modified weapon charged with Necrobane, Stun and EMP damages.

This modification deprives item's quality levels.
LanguageData.OMG_Trophy_PowerGuitar.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.Bullet_OMG_Trophy_R.label: Death’s Call bullet
LanguageData.Shell_OMG_Trophy_R.label: Death’s Call capsule
LanguageData.OMG_Trophy_Revolver.label: Death’s Call
LanguageData.OMG_Trophy_Revolver.description:
Crafted from dark technology, this revolver can turn any victim into a relentless Shambler. With each pull of the trigger, the dead rise again, cursed to walk in unholy servitude.

Specially modified weapon charged with Necrobane, Deadlife, Stun and EMP damages.

This modification deprives item's quality levels.
LanguageData.OMG_Trophy_Revolver.tools.grip.label: grip
LanguageData.OMG_Trophy_Revolver.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.EGO_Trophy_Dragonbane_A.label: Dragonbane Bite
LanguageData.EGO_Trophy_Dragonbane_A.description:
Dr. Alexander Isaacs never intended to slay dragons—only to understand them. Yet, in the depths of his relentless experiments, something unnatural took shape. A weapon born not of craftsmanship, but of twisted science and forgotten wills, thirsting for the very essence it was made to destroy.

Gestated Amalgam weapon charged with Cryo and Acid damages.

Knife born from an unholy fusion, carrying the potential to evolve further.
LanguageData.EGO_Trophy_Dragonbane_B.label: Dragonbane Strike
LanguageData.EGO_Trophy_Dragonbane_B.description:
Dr. Alexander Isaacs never intended to slay dragons—only to understand them. Yet, in the depths of his relentless experiments, something unnatural took shape. A weapon born not of craftsmanship, but of twisted science and forgotten wills, thirsting for the very essence it was made to destroy.

Gestated Amalgam weapon charged with Cryo and Acid damages.

This modification deprives item's quality levels.

Knife with enhanced armor penetration. Its evolution is not yet over.
LanguageData.EGO_Trophy_Dragonbane_C.label: Dragonbane Slash
LanguageData.EGO_Trophy_Dragonbane_C.description:
Dr. Alexander Isaacs never intended to slay dragons—only to understand them. Yet, in the depths of his relentless experiments, something unnatural took shape. A weapon born not of craftsmanship, but of twisted science and forgotten wills, thirsting for the very essence it was made to destroy.

Gestated Amalgam weapon charged with Cryo and Acid damages.

This modification deprives item's quality levels.

Sword of increased power, though its newfound weight slows each strike. Its evolution is not yet over.
LanguageData.EGO_Trophy_Dragonbane_C.tools.edge.label: edge
LanguageData.EGO_Trophy_Dragonbane_D.label: Dragonbane Warblade
LanguageData.EGO_Trophy_Dragonbane_D.description:
Dr. Alexander Isaacs never intended to slay dragons—only to understand them. Yet, in the depths of his relentless experiments, something unnatural took shape. A weapon born not of craftsmanship, but of twisted science and forgotten wills, thirsting for the very essence it was made to destroy.

Gestated Amalgam weapon charged with Cryo, Acid and Flame damages.

This modification deprives item's quality levels.

Sword that now burns with unnatural flame, igniting both flesh and fate. Its evolution is not yet over.
LanguageData.EGO_Trophy_Dragonbane_D.tools.edge.label: edge

LanguageData.EGO_Trophy_Dragonbane_E.description:
Dr. Alexander Isaacs never intended to slay dragons—only to understand them. Yet, in the depths of his relentless experiments, something unnatural took shape. A weapon born not of craftsmanship, but of twisted science and forgotten wills, thirsting for the very essence it was made to destroy.

Gestated Amalgam weapon charged with Cryo, Acid and Flame damages.

This modification deprives item's quality levels.

Big Sword of devastating force, slowed by its own monstrous size. Its evolution is not yet over.
LanguageData.EGO_Trophy_Dragonbane_E.tools.edge.label: edge

Dr. Alexander Isaacs never intended to slay dragons—only to understand them. Yet, in the depths of his relentless experiments, something unnatural took shape. A weapon born not of craftsmanship, but of twisted science and forgotten wills, thirsting for the very essence it was made to destroy.

LanguageData.EGO_Trophy_Dragonbane_G.label: Dragonbane Godslayer
LanguageData.EGO_Trophy_Dragonbane_G.description:
Dr. Alexander Isaacs never intended to slay dragons—only to understand them. Yet, in the depths of his relentless experiments, something unnatural took shape. A weapon born not of craftsmanship, but of twisted science and forgotten wills, thirsting for the very essence it was made to destroy.

Gestated Amalgam weapon charged with Cryo, Acid and Flame damages.

This modification deprives item's quality levels.

Spear that awakens hidden forces, its power shaped by the universe itself. The final evolution.
